Sentence.sentence: The current low fossil fuel price environment will thus certainly delay the energy transition from fossil fuel to clean energy sources.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Today's teenagers admire their parents and welcome parental guidance about important matters such as career choice—though certainly not Mom and Dad's advice on matters of personal taste, such as music or fashion.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: They seem to be turning inward—generally in a pro-social manner, certainly with positive benefits for intimate relationships, but too often at the expense of a connection with the present and future world beyond, including the society they will one day inherit.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The Millennium Ecosystem Assessment, a vast four-year global study which reported its initial conclusions earlier this year, found reasons to believe that managing ecosystems sustainably—working with nature rather than against it—might be less profitable in the short term, but certainly brings long-term rewards.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Defaults are certainly part of the solution.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The Swedes can certainly take a lesson from the United States and look for ways to clear a path for their ambitious female careerists.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The thought is certainly enough to keep the pot boiling under parents like Meg, the lawyer-mom, as she tries to help her son choose an essay topic.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Well, he's certainly a very polite young man.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: They would certainly appeal to his audience
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: No, but it certainly makes it more of a challenge.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: This experiment certainly does not definitely prove that girls start to reason before boys, but it provides a clue that scientists would like to study more carefully.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The recession has certainly come with more problems than Andrea anticipated, but she remains unfailingly optimistic
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: I think your article in the school newspaper is right on target, and your viewpoints have certainly convinced me.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Cafés certainly are a very competitive market sector.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Certainly, there're benefits to a college major beyond the job a student can perform.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Collaboration certainly makes your individual competencies and contributions more difficult for outsiders to identify.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Experts said that whether or not Apple loses this specific case, measures that it could put into place in the future will almost certainly be able to further limit the government's reach.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: I don't think we know exactly what's going to happen but it's certainly possible that we could get very slow growth over the next year or two.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: It is most certainly shaped by a person's culture as well as how they were raised in their childhood.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: It's certainly varied and sometimes bizarre.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Rabbits are very peaceful and certainly do not bite.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Still, if you're interested in nature, then that certainly can be worked into your dissertation.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: The complex style of the medieval wooden church carvings and the skills used to make them almost certainly to derive from the ancient Viking tradition.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: The millennium Ecosystem Assessment, a vast four-year global study which reported its initial conclusions earlier this year, found reasons to believe that managing ecosystems sustainably—working with nature rather than against it—might be less profitable
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: They seem to be turning inward—generally in a pro-social manner, certainly with positive benefits for intimate relationships, but too often at the expense of a connection with the present and future world beyond, including the society they will one day in
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: While the efforts are certainly not futile, the results of such bans will likely only start to be seen by generations down the line, bettering the world for the future.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: You certainly shouldn't ditch teamwork, but how can you avoid the hazards of being an over-collaborator?
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些副词或词组均有"肯定地，当然"之意。
means: certainly ： 强调有把握，深信不疑。
naturally ： 指自然而然，毫无造作或天生如此。
of course ： 指毫无疑问，自然如此。可与certainly和naturally换用。
surely ： 表一种必然的可能性，也可表示信心或不轻信。强调主观判断。

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
stems_affixes.word_buile: actual[adj.实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的]+ly……地→adv.实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
stems_affixes.word_buile: current当前的,流动的+ly……地→adv.普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
decided确定的+ly……地→adv.果断地,断然地
definite明确的+ly……地→adv.一定地,明确地
easy容易的+ly……地→easily容易地
economical节约的,经济的+ly……地→adv.经济地,经济学地
exact强求,精确的+ly……地→adv.正确地,严密地
exceeding非常的+ly……地→adv.极端地,非常
excessive过分的+ly……地→adv.过分地,非常地
extreme极端的+ly……地→adv.极端地,极其,非常
aggressive侵略的+ly……地→adv. 侵略地,攻势地
financial财政的,金融的+ly……地→adv.财政上,金融上
formal正式的;形式的+ly……地→adv.正式地,形式上
fortunate幸运的+ly……地→adv.幸运地
general总的,大体的+ly……地→adv.一般,通常,一般地
glorious光荣的,显赫的+ly……地→adv.光荣地,辉煌地
great大的+ly……地→adv.大大地,非常
immediate立即的+ly……地→adv.立即,马上,直接地
incidental附带的+ly……地→adv.附带地,顺便提及
increasing渐增的+ly……地→adv.日益,愈加
instant立即的;紧迫的+ly……地→adv.立即地,即刻地
like像+ly……地→有些像的→很可能
logical逻辑的,符合逻辑的+ly……地→adv.论理上,逻辑上
mental精神的+ly……地→adv.精神上,智力上,在内心
moderate中等的,适度的+ly……地→adv.适度地
natural自然的+ly……地→adv.自然地
necessary必要的+ly……地→necessarily必要地
polite有礼貌的+ly……地→adv.客气地,斯文地,优雅地
positive肯定的,积极的+ly……地→adv.断然地;肯定地
preferable更可取的+ly……地→preferably更适宜
present现在+ly……地→adv.目前,不久
probable可能的+ly……地→probably或许,大概
progressive前进的+ly……地→adv.日益增多地
prompt敏捷的+ly……地→adv.敏捷地,迅速地
relative相对的;相关的+ly……地→adv.相关地
repeated重复的+ly表副词→adv.重复地,再三地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
stems_affixes.word_buile: short短+ly……地→adv.立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
sufficient足够的+ly……地→adv.十分地,充分地
undoubted无疑的,确实的+ly……地→adv.无庸置疑地,的确地
unfortunate不幸的+ly……地→adv.不幸地
uniform贯的,一致的+ly……地→adv.一律地,均一地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊

Sentence.sentence: I can certainly change that for you, but there will be a change in the room rate.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: I certainly could enjoy the exercise, but I've agreed to go with Alice to buy some clothes.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷2 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: I must say that I have certainly come to enjoy camping.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: It certainly was, Paris had suffered a sudden heart failure.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: It is certainly fun but the lifestyle is a little unreal.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷3 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: The first commercially available driverless cars will almost certainly be fielded by ride-hailing services, considering the cost of self-driving technology as well as liability and maintenance issues.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: The lessons they learned may not be different from what they would have gotten in school, but are certainly more personal and meaningful, because they had to work them out on their own.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷2 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: This certainly makes my own views clearer.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: We certainly do spend a good deal of our time waiting.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: While Harold and Erica are certainly not strong or memorable characters, the more serious problems with the social animal lie elsewhere.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 阅读理解 阅读E 原文

Sentence.sentence: Certainly, there are valid concerns about the patchwork regulations that could result if every state sets its own rules.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But it can be done: Glasgow's year as European capital of culture can certainly be seen as one of complex series of factors that have turned the city into the power of art, music and theatre that it remains today.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: But they certainly will reshape it, and all the more so the longer they extend.
Sentence.come: 2012年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Certainly, it's incredibly hard to maintain patience at all times with your children.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: Certainly, no homework should be assigned that students cannot complete on their own or that they cannot do without expensive equipment.
Sentence.come: 2012年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Their clever designs and lightweight composites certainly make a difference.
Sentence.come: 2010年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

means.word_mean: 无疑地; 确定地；肯定地

sentences.en: I certainly did not like the place.
sentences.cn: 我确实不喜欢那个地方。

sentences.en: I will certainly see you into the train.
sentences.cn: 我一定要送你上火车。

sentence.cn: 他们学到的课程可能和他们在学校学到的没有什么不同，但肯定更个性化，更有意义，因为他们必须自己解决。
sentence.en: The lessons they learned may not be different from what they would have gotten in school,  but are certainly more personal and meaningful,  because they had to work them out on their own.
sentence.from: 2015年高考英语全国卷2 完形填空 原文

entry.def: You use certainly to emphasize what you are saying when you are making a statement.

example.ex: The public is certainly getting tired of hearing about it...
example.tran: 关于此事，公众当然已经听腻了。

example.ex: The bombs are almost certainly part of a much bigger conspiracy...
example.tran: 几乎可以肯定，这些炸弹是一个更大的阴谋的一部分。

entry.def: You use certainly when you are agreeing with what someone has said.

example.tran: “无论如何，你们都是好朋友吧。”——“那当然。”

example.ex: 'You keep out of their way don't you?' — 'I certainly do.'
example.tran: “你会离他们远远的，是吧？”——“一点儿不假。”

entry.def: You say certainly not when you want to say 'no' in a strong way.

example.ex: 'Perhaps it would be better if I withdrew altogether.' — 'Certainly not!'
example.tran: “也许，我完全退出更好吧。”——“当然不是！”

means.word_mean: 1. definitely or positively (`sure' is sometimes used informally for `surely');

sentences.sentence: "it's going to be a good day for sure"
"they thought he had been killed sure enough"

sentences.cn: “你认为这些钱会改变你的生活吗？”“当然不会。”
sentences.en: ‘Do you think all this money will change your life? ’ ‘Certainly not. ’

sentences.cn: 要是不治疗，她十有八九会死。
sentences.en: Without treatment, she will almost certainly die.

sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，幼年对儿童的成长至关重要。
sentences.en: Certainly, the early years are crucial to a child's development.

sentences.cn: 我肯定不会再去那里了。
sentences.en: I'm certainly never going there again.

sentences.cn: “斯科特先生，请出示您的护照好吗？”“当然可以。”
sentences.en: ‘May I see your passport, Mr Scott? ’ ‘Certainly. ’

sentences.cn: 关于此事，公众当然已经听腻了。
sentences.en: The public is certainly getting tired of hearing about it...

sentences.cn: 几乎可以肯定，这些炸弹是一个更大的阴谋的一部分。
sentences.en: The bombs are almost certainly part of a much bigger conspiracy...

sentences.cn: “无论如何，你们都是好朋友吧。”——“那当然。”
sentences.en: 'In any case you remained friends.' — 'Certainly.'...

sentences.cn: “你会离他们远远的，是吧？”——“一点儿不假。”
sentences.en: 'You keep out of their way don't you?' — 'I certainly do.'

sentences.cn: “也许，我完全退出更好吧。”——“当然不是！”
sentences.en: 'Perhaps it would be better if I withdrew altogether.' — 'Certainly not!'

sentences.cn: 我去是去, 可是得晚一点儿.
sentences.en: I'm certainly going, but I'll be a little bit late.

sentences.cn: 人不犯我,我不犯人; 人若犯我, 我必犯人.
sentences.en: We will not attack unless we are attacked; if we are attacked, we will certainly counterattack.

sentences.cn: 他们会搞出名堂来的.
sentences.en: They'll certainly accomplish something.

sentences.cn: 我们肯定能按时完成任务.
sentences.en: We can certainly have the job finished on time.

sentences.cn: 组织不善肯定是导致危机的因素之一.
sentences.en: Poor organization was certainly a contributory factor to the crisis.

sentences.cn: 高赋税政策肯定是不受欢迎的, 但也未必能满足飞涨的军备开支.
sentences.en: The high tax policy is certainly unpopular, although it's unlikely to meet the soaring armament expenditures.

sentences.cn: 他真的想通了, 打算55岁就退休.
sentences.en: He's certainly got the right idea, retiring at 55.

sentences.cn: 我可以肯定地向你保证,我会照顾好自己的.
sentences.en: I can certainly assure you I'm looking after number one all right.

sentences.cn: 寄信要多花一点钱, 但无疑书信走得会快一些.
sentences.en: Letters will cost a little more, but they will certainly travel faster.

sentences.cn: 我一定要送你上火车.
sentences.en: I will certainly see you into the train.

sentences.cn: 他当然不像是个傻瓜.
sentences.en: He certainly didn't seem to be a fool.

sentences.cn: 她当然只是一个普普通通的母亲.
sentences.en: She's certainly not great shakes as a mother.

sentences.cn: 那些孩子当然把我为宴会准备的食物全部吃完喽!
sentences.en: Those children certainly disposed of all the food that I prepared for the party!

sentences.cn: 哈得诺思上尉当然要求那个告密者离职了.
sentences.en: Captain Hardnose certainly ran that rat over the hill.

sentences.cn: 我要是你肯定会保持警惕.
sentences.en: I should certainly be on my guard if I were you.

sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，幼年对儿童的成长至关重要。
sentences.en: Certainly, the early years are crucial to a child's development.

sentences.cn: 精巧的设计和轻质复合材料的使用无疑使它们与众不同。
sentences.en: Their clever designs and lightweight composites certainly make a difference.

sentences.cn: 她无疑是要想出一个办法来使他承认的.
sentences.en: And she certainly intended to find a way to make him admit it.

sentences.cn: 外科手术的统计数据无疑是令人吃惊的.
sentences.en: The surgical statistics are certainly alarming.

sentences.cn: 通过工会, 他们的组织无疑更完善.同时, 他们也是政治捐赠者.
sentences.en: They are certainly better organised, via their trade unions, and they are political donors too.

sentences.cn: 我敢说, 把这一点考虑进去是懦怯的, 但这样做无疑是顾虑周全.
sentences.en: I dare say it's cowardly, but it's certainly discreet, to take it into consideration.

sentences.cn: 毫无疑问, 规模较小的银行已经大幅度地减少, 他们加总起来的市场份额也是如此.
sentences.en: Certainly, the number of small banks has fallen dramatically, as has their combined market share.

sentences.cn: 一定不要用这么短的一段时间来判断全部的经验而最无疑的是, 不要恐慌!
sentences.en: Don't judge the total experience by this short span of time and most certainly, DON'T PANIC!

sentences.cn: 无疑,他们一定知道这样讲话可能产生的后果.
sentences.en: Certainly they must know the probable result of such speeches.

sentences.cn: 理查德的确很勇敢,毫无疑问,他是一个好兵.
sentences.en: Richard certainly was braveand and undoubtedly he was a good soldier.

sentences.cn: 无疑地,如果奇迹底意思是“超越自然”, 那么奇迹多是在厄运中出现的.
sentences.en: Certainly if miracles be the command over nature, they appear most in adversity.

sentences.cn: 消费者无疑会对日货质量要求苛刻.
sentences.en: Consumers certainly make harsh judgments about Japanese products.

sentences.cn: 李尔王无疑是这部戏中最难的角色.
sentences.en: King Lear is certainly the most difficult part in the play.

sentences.cn: 笔,一支笔毫无疑问是一件利器,或调正他的注意力,也能引燃他的(内在)的动力.
sentences.en: A pen is certainly an excellent Instrument a Mans Attention and to inflame his Ambition.

sentences.cn: 这个报道无疑指出了那是正确的.
sentences.en: The report certainly suggests that to be true.

sentences.cn: 这部影片毫无疑问激起了公众对这种稀有鸟类的兴趣.
sentences.en: The film has certainly piqued public interest in this rare bird.

sentences.cn: 毫无疑问,我们不会容许任何人利用香港作为破坏中国的稳定的基地.
sentences.en: Certainly Hong Kong should not be permitted to be used as a base to destabilise China.

sentences.cn: 寄信要多花一点钱, 但无疑书信走得会快一些.
sentences.en: Letters will cost a little more, but they will certainly travel faster.

sentences.cn: 那年轻歌手第一次公演对她无疑是一次考验.
sentences.en: Her first public performance will certainly put the young singer to the test.

sentences.cn: 坎贝尔无疑很期待回归主力位置.
sentences.en: Campbell is certainly pushing for a return.

sentences.cn: 日本和德国眼下无疑正处于这种情况, 它们衰退的速度快于牛仔抛出套索的速度.
sentences.en: Japan and Germany are certainly in that situation now, having contracted faster than a cowboy's lasso.

sentences.cn: 毫无疑问的,特蕾西重新定义了我们的标准.
sentences.en: Tracy certainly has redefined our standards.

sentences.cn: 第二天天气酷热, 夏日几乎要终结, 然而这也无疑是夏天中最热的一天.
